name: Dispelling Bee
description:
Welcome to Dispelling Bee! You play as Apicurio, a protector of magic tasked with bringing those who abuse magic to justice. You have been sent out to deal with three different ne'er-do-wells, each armed with powerful spells, but you have a special ability they don't...you can dispel their spells! Use your own spells to attack your opponents while undoing their efforts to attack you in this gimmicky little typing game.

This game requires a keyboard to play.

Controls: Menus:

Arrow keys to navigate menus, Enter to select. Escape to pause.

Battle:

Keyboard to type spells, Enter to cast spells. Pressing Enter 3 times in a row will refresh the spell currently in your spellbook. Escape to pause.

Credits:

Programming, Art & Audio: Tzeryushi

Other Stuff:

There's occasionally some lag on HTML. If you're experiencing persistent issues, I'd recommend downloading the game.
